column4: I've got a user with a projector hooked up to an external display on his laptop, and everything works great except that DVDs that get played are visible only on his laptop. Any suggestions?
hit that crt/lcd button... it's 'function-f8' on my lappy
that doesn't send the DVD signal; just everything else.
I haven't messed with it enough to get the image ONLY displaying on the external display; I suspect/hope that may work. But surely there's a way to display all the video internally AND externally...
